meanings.definition: Great energy or enthusiasm in pursuit of a cause or an objective.
meanings.sent1: Her zeal for helping others was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The team worked with great zeal to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: His zeal for collecting stamps led to a room full of albums.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted with such zeal that the canvas seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent5: The child's zeal for learning new things was contagious to everyone around.

meanings.definition: Eagerness and ardent interest in pursuit of something.
meanings.sent1: The student's zeal for reading made him finish the book in one sitting.
meanings.sent2: She approached every task with zeal and determination.
meanings.sent3: His zeal for trying new foods led to some interesting culinary adventures.
meanings.sent4: The explorer's zeal for discovery knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's zeal for playtime was evident in its wagging tail.
